normalised: Real Estate and Property Snippet: Rental Agreement Blues?

unnormalised: Mumbai - Renting a flat in Aamchi Mumbai can be a real headache, especially understanding those pesky rental agreements! Are you paying too much security deposit? A new study by the Dr. Ambedkar Institute suggests many landlords are still demanding exorbitant amounts, sometimes exceeding 6 months rent!
normalised: Mumbai - Renting a flat in Aamchi Mumbai can be a real headache, especially understanding those pesky rental agreements! Are you paying too much security deposit? A new study by the Doctor Ambedkar Institute suggests many landlords are still demanding exorbitant amounts, sometimes exceeding six months rent!

unnormalised: Turns out, many tenants are unaware of their rights. Clauses about yearly rent increases exceeding 10% are often illegal. And what about maintenance charges? Should you be paying for repairs beyond normal wear and tear?
normalised: Turns out, many tenants are unaware of their rights. Clauses about yearly rent increases exceeding ten percent are often illegal. And what about maintenance charges? Should you be paying for repairs beyond normal wear and tear?

unnormalised: Experts recommend thoroughly reading the entire agreement BEFORE signing on the dotted line. Don't hesitate to negotiate! Things like repainting after you move out, or paying for structural repairs, should be clarified upfront.
normalised: Experts recommend thoroughly reading the entire agreement before signing on the dotted line. Don't hesitate to negotiate! Things like repainting after you move out, or paying for structural repairs, should be clarified upfront.

unnormalised: Heard about that couple in Bandra who were charged Rs. 5000 for "wall damage" after hanging a picture? Ouch!
normalised: Heard about that couple in Bandra who were charged rupees five thousand for "wall damage" after hanging a picture? Ouch!

unnormalised: Make sure the agreement clearly states the carpet area (in sq ft) of the property. Avoid ambiguity. A good agreement protects both landlord AND tenant. Happy renting, folks! Just remember your rights!
normalised: Make sure the agreement clearly states the carpet area in square feet of the property. Avoid ambiguity. A good agreement protects both landlord and tenant. Happy renting, folks! Just remember your rights!
